Modify the attending types associated with a clinical role

1 Click the Clinical Roles button .

Or, on the Create/Edit menu, click Clinical Role.

2 In the Description box, enter the name of the role.

3 In the Available Attending Types box, click the types that you want to associate with the role. Then click >>.

4 In the Selected Attending Types box, click the types that you want to disassociate from the role. Then click <<.

5 Click OK.
